statements: UPSERT INTO blockchain_transactions (transaction_id, block_id, from_address, to_address, amount, timestamp) VALUES (1, 1, '0x123abc', '0x456def', 100.50, '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE block_id = VALUES(block_id), from_address = VALUES(from_address), to_address = VALUES(to_address), amount = VALUES(amount), timestamp = VALUES(timestamp);

UPSERT INTO blockchain_blocks (block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, timestamp) VALUES (1, 'hash123', 'prevhash456', '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE block_hash = VALUES(block_hash), previous_block_hash = VALUES(previous_block_hash), timestamp = VALUES(timestamp);

UPSERT INTO blockchain_users (user_id, user_name, balance, registration_date, last_login) VALUES (1, 'Alice', 1000.00, '2022-01-01', '2022-01-01') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE user_name = VALUES(user_name), balance = VALUES(balance), registration_date = VALUES(registration_date), last_login = VALUES(last_login);
